text: The Tunisian National Dialogue Quartet (Arabic: الرباعي التونسي للحوار الوطني, French: Quartet du dialogue national) is a group of four civil society organizations. They focus on democracy and the constitutional settlement in Tunisia. The quartet was formed in the summer of 2013 after a political crisis. On 9 October 2015, the quartet was awarded the 2015 Nobel Peace Prize. ==References== Category:Organizations based in Tunisia
title: Tunisian National Dialogue Quartet
